description: Currently, you can find out the alert status on subway or commuter rail lines, as well as the Silver Line. You can also find out the realtime status of individual trains. Bus information will be in a future update.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Boston Transit when the next train to South Station gets in to Kendall
how is the Red Line doing
when the next Wonderland bound train leaves from Aquarium
name: Boston Transit
shortDescription: Find out the status of MBTA public transit (subway, Silver, and commuter line status, as well as real time predictions for trains).
